name: search_exact_phrase_api
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool complete_study_bible.
Tool description: The most COMPLETE Bible study API available! Strongs, Locations, Dictionaries, and more! 
API description: Searches the King James Version (KJV) of the Bible for the exact phrase supplied and returns the result.

phrase.description: The exact phrase to search for in the KJV Bible.
